channel.title: CVE Feed for vanyukov -- Market Exporter
channel.description: The latest CVEs for vanyukov -- Market Exporter

item.title: CVE-2024-5637|2024-06-07T15:39:38.215Z -- vanyukov -- market%20exporter
item.description: The Market Exporter plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the 'remove_files' function in all versions up to, and including, 2.0.19. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to use path traversal to delete arbitrary files on the server.

item.title: CVE-2024-5637|2024-06-07T11:02:21.508Z -- vanyukov -- market%20exporter
item.description: The Market Exporter plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the 'remove_files' function in all versions up to, and including, 2.0.19. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to use path traversal to delete arbitrary files on the server.
